food.name: Stuffed Peppers
recipe: Preheat oven to 400Â° F and line a baking tray with parchment paper.
carefully slice the capsicum and discard the ribs and seeds, and place them on the prepared baking tray. Spray with a bit of cooking oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake for 8-10 minutes
Stir fry some onions, tomato, garlic, beans and corn with red pepper flakes, ground cumin, smoked paprika, salt, and pepper
Carefully spoon the mixture into the roasted peppers
Then place back into the oven and cook for 6-8 minutes with some cheese on top
once done,take it out and server hot

food.name: Carrot Lemon Rice
recipe: Saute some mustard, urad dhal, red chillies, onion and peanuts(optional)in hot oil
Add some salt and in 2 mins, add in the shredded carrots and saute again for 5 mins
Once cooked, add left over rice from previous day and mix well
New cooked rice can be used as well
Garnish with coriander and a sqeeze of lemon

food.name: Nannari drink
recipe: Soak some tukmaria seeds in cold water for about 30 minutes
In a glass add 250 ml of water and 2 tbsps of nannari syrup
Mix well and add sugar if needed
Squeeze in half a lime and mix well
